meta.translationNotAvailable: Es gibt leider keine Übersetzung für diese Seite.
meta.translationIncomplete: Nicht der komplette Text wird in dieser Sprache übersetzt.

home.error: Fehler beim einsehen der Items, versuche es später erneut.
home.error-too-long: Es dauert anscheinend länger als erwartet.

shop.title: Aktueller Shop
shop.error: Shop nicht verfügbar, versuche es später erneut.
shop.line1: Der aktuelle Item-Shop in Battle Royale - aktualisiert täglich um [00:00 UTC](https://time.is/UTC|tooltip=Current time in UTC|newtab=true).
shop.line2: Du kannst den gestrigen Item-Shop [hier](/shop/yesterday|tooltip=Gestriger Item-Shop) sehen.
shop.line3: Klicke auf einen Gegenstand um mehr über diesen zu erfahren.

upcoming.title: Bald verfügbare Gegenstände
upcoming.line1: Alle noch nicht erschienenen Gegenstände in Fortnite Battle Royale.

list.title: Gegenstandsliste
list.line1: Jeder verfügbare Gegenstand in Fortnite Battle Royale.

list.title: Item Shop History
list.line1: Here are the last 8 days of item shop rotations for Fortnite Battle Royale.
list.line2: Click one to view full shop or scroll to view full item shop history by day.

view.title: Shop Rotation
view.line1: This is the item shop rotation of [date] for Fortnite Battle Royale.
view.line2: Click a cosmetic to see more information about it.

news.title: News
news.line1: The current in-game news feed from Epic Games. Updated every minute.
news.error: We were unable to get the news from Fortnite, we'll try again shortly.

randomiser.title: Randomiser
randomiser.line1: Pick a random outfit from every item available.

oauth.title: Login to fnbr.co
oauth.legacy-text: Alternatively, if you have a legacy account from 2018 needing migration:
oauth.privacy-text: By logging in you agree to us storing data associated with your account as set out in our [privacy policy](/privacy).

username.title: Welcome to fnbr.co
username.line1: You are logged in with Discord, to interact with others on our site we need you to pick a username
username.nameTaken: Your username [attemptedName] is taken by another user, we have added your Discord discriminator to it and suggest you use that.
username.randomName: Your username [attemptedName] is taken by another user, we were unable to make a unique name using your Discord discriminator.
username.form-criteria: Please choose a username between 2 and 32 characters, which may contain alphanumeric characters as well as underscores and hyphens.

locked.title: Unable to login
locked.line1: You aren't able to login to fnbr.co because [your account has been locked](class=text-danger).

migrated.title: Account migrated
migrated.line1: You logged in with Twitter as
migrated.line2: However, that account has been migrated to use Discord login.

notFound.title: No Account Found
notFound.line1: You logged in with Twitter as
notFound.line2: However, that account has never logged in before and we now only support Twitter login for migration purposes.

404.title: Error
404.line1: Either the resource you requested doesn't exist, or you don't have permission to view it.

500.title: Uh oh!
500.line1: Something went wrong while processing your request, please try again later!
500.line2: You can try to login again [here](/oauth).
